name: creme
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a soft substance that you use to improve the appearance of your skin or hair or use as make-up: She believes that a good eye creme is essential if you're over 30. This creme blusher is easy to apply.
[ U ] mainly US a soft, usually sweet, food substance that looks or tastes similar to cream: This is a sandwich made with peanut butter and marshmallow creme. The snack cakes have a delicious creme filling.
[ C ] mainly UK a sweet or biscuit with a soft, sweet filling: Do you prefer coconut cremes or caramels? Would you like one of these chocolate sandwich cremes? Synonym
creamSee also
crème anglaise

crème fraîche
More examplesFewer examplesI prefer to use self-tanning creme rather than spray tan. This creme rinse conditions the hair beautifully.For dessert I had the vanilla creme pie, and my friend had the chocolate cupcakes. They used to buy old-fashioned selection boxescontaining fruity cremes, nougats, and the occasional champagne truffle.All that's left is a coffee creme and a hazelnut whirl.
